specifications.title: Specifications
specifications.High: High shear mill – 1500 rpm. Soft starter controlled
specifications.Heated: Heated tanks on load cell weighing systems
specifications.Graphite: Graphite based soft seals for mill with water cooling system
specifications.Inverter: Inverter controlled mill feeding pump with 50 m³/h capacity
specifications.capacity: 7 m³ batch tank capacity with 60mm rock-wool insulation, heating lines and dual agitators
specifications.Touch: Touch screen monitor for full automatic operation

hero.title: Batch Asphalt-Mixing Plants
hero.description: Innovative Solutions for High-Quality Asphalt Production

section.title: Consistent from Start to Finish
section.description: AGCP batch plants provide the consistency that is crucial to mix quality. All plant processes and components are carefully developed to ensure that feeding, heating, drying, screening and mixing seamlessly blend together. Helping integrate all the moving parts is the as 1 Control System, which provides leading technology with a user-friendly interface.
